name: The Dunwich Revival
description:
Based loosely on The Dunwich Horror. Lavinia Wynn, reincarnation of Lavinia Whateley, has been kidnapped for an eldritch ritual by her father, and all she can do is talk with her cellmate as they look forward to the horrors that await them. But perhaps all is not as it appears, and the story of the Dunwich Horror may have been mistold for a long time...

Made for the Cosmic Horrors Jam with the themes of Family and Reincarnation, and to a lesser extent Side Effects and Theatrical. The Cthulhu Mythos is played with very fast and loose here, as is The Dunwich Horror itself. Around 5,000 words with 2 endings.

CONTENT WARNINGS: Static sound effects, quick flashing images, death, descriptions of blood and violence.
